website_summaries.verdict: For the price, these discs work well for a beginner looking to get out on the course.
pros: Comes with a putter, mid-range disc, and driver
At low speeds, these discs fly reliably straight, making them ideal for beginners
cons: Intermediate to advanced players will not find much value in these discs

customer_reviews.title: Get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Well the good, they got me and my 9 year old excited to go play Frisbee together. Bad part, went back and bought a set of INOVA discs cause these just don't fly. As soon as I threw the INOVA set, i realized how really really poor these disc's are. Spend a few more bucks, get a set that works and have a ton more fun.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tolerable condition, but ABYSMAL flight performance.
customer_reviews.text: This discs are ... terrible. The package arrived, and the discs were slightly scuffed from movement within the product packaging. After unpacking, they further had smears/scuffs on the undersides that looked to me like they'd previously been handled, if not thrown. The worst part: the aerodynamics are HORRIBLE. Throwing backhand yields OK results, although these discs have serious fade. A forehand throw results in a right-to-left rotating INVERSION of the disc in midair (think Maverick keeping up foreign relations with the MiG in "Top Gun") -- enough that they dive to the ground, typically landing UPSIDE-DOWN. Unacceptable.
customer_reviews.author: Clive Fenster

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for durability and price. Great starter set
customer_reviews.text: Needed a set up for the kids to get outdoor activity space while hot summer picks up. These are incredible for the price. Amazing beginner set. Not sure what a non beginner feels like...? But these r very easy to use and we r very happy w them. The price and durability for kids and family cant be beat.
customer_reviews.author: Onlineshoppermommie

customer_reviews.title: wow
customer_reviews.text: these are poorly designed disss, not for anyone who knows how to control their discs. Terrible.
customer_reviews.author: DEREK

customer_reviews.title: Works but I am still learning
customer_reviews.text: I am new at this so I have not figured out yet how to throw them well.
customer_reviews.author: Clinton Harris

customer_reviews.title: Used Goods, poor product
customer_reviews.text: Came extremely dirty, pet hair in box, scuffed up, grease.....obviously used. Figured they're gonna get dirty anyway......more concerned with quality of flight.....reviews are accurate....not worth the money even for practice by a beginner. Disappointing....
customer_reviews.author: Barb

customer_reviews.title: Can’t beat it!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing Discs for the Price. Love it for our family of disc golfers.
customer_reviews.author: Dorothys Girl

customer_reviews.title: Beginners set
customer_reviews.text: Beginner set, don’t expect much. Just use them to see if this is a sport you like before you spend a lot more on a good set.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not the best discs (i sure wouldn't throw them) But a great ...
customer_reviews.text: Not the best discs (i sure wouldn't throw them) But a great cheap set to get a beginner going. These were for my son, and now I have added some Innova discs to his bag, but this was a good set to get him started.
customer_reviews.author: Adam K

customer_reviews.title: Excellent starter disc
customer_reviews.text: Love these disc they were a great gift for my family to use out on the course. They through nicely and glide easily into the wind.
customer_reviews.author: Janet W.

customer_reviews.title: great for teens
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as advertised! Great gift idea for pre-teens and teens. Very pleased
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: We took these to the park the day after receiving ...
customer_reviews.text: We took these to the park the day after receiving them. On our first outing with the Frisbees, the mid-range broke upon impact on a tree. While these items were purchased in part for their price, the fact that they cannot withstand the basic actions of their intended purpose, is a production fail. We will find another company from which to purchase Frisbee Golf discs.
customer_reviews.author: Bryce Bush

customer_reviews.title: Cheap junk
customer_reviews.text: These discs are terrible. A waste of money. The mid-range broke the first time we used it. I have always bought Innova discs in the past and they have never cracked. I thought these would be a nice starter disc for my younger children but I wish I would have spent the money and bought Innova.
customer_reviews.author: JLA

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Works great now if I could just figure out how to throw the damn things!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awful unless you are 8 years old.
customer_reviews.text: Awful! If you try to throw it with any speed it shoots up in the air, flips over and dive bombs. My 8 year old nephew could throw it straight but had no speed to his throw.
customer_reviews.author: C. Bittner

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: They are junk. Very hard plastic instead of soft. One broke in half before we completed one round.
customer_reviews.author: matt

customer_reviews.title: Would only recommend weak small children to throw these bricks
customer_reviews.text: Very very hard, heavy discs. Disc shattered when it hit a tree. Would only recommend weak small children to throw these bricks.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: descent pack but driver suck
customer_reviews.text: first off these three disc cost about 10.00 which is roughly the cost of one ivana. straight up the putter is worth the price of all three, it's great. the mid range flys well, got to learn how it flys and it does well. the driver straight up sucks. it goes way right and the mid range actually covers more distance than the driver. this is a good starter pack but spend more money on ivana or gateway.
customer_reviews.author: skymom

customer_reviews.title: flying golf
customer_reviews.text: have not got to get out and use just yet but they do feel great when i throw them around the yard
customer_reviews.author: DAVID M STEPHENS

customer_reviews.title: Frisbees that will turn you off the sport forever
customer_reviews.text: I have used many Frisbee before and these ones are the worst I have ever used. They r solid plastic and when you throw the driver it goes 15ft and spins upside down in the air. Real poor quality. Not even worth it for a beginner set as you will never wanna play again. Just buy a 10 dollar good driver and then buy the mid range and putter later. Don't really need those to start anyways.
customer_reviews.author: brittany

customer_reviews.title: Junk. Avoid these, they aren't the same material ...
customer_reviews.text: Junk. Avoid these, they aren't the same material as a quality disc and they just roll over when you throw them hard.
customer_reviews.author: R. Brandon West

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: These are great disc & seem well made. Great value for the price and compared to other disc we have used.
customer_reviews.author: Merblyn

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: these are not real golf discs they are just a hard plastic that don't fly
customer_reviews.author: THOMAS B.

customer_reviews.title: Meh.
customer_reviews.text: These are fine for folks who want to try disc golf, but are unsure if they'll like it or not. Go with more experienced throwers and try their quality discs. Most of the whiners reviewing this product seem to be experienced so I don't know why they would buy these discs. Boo hoo. You're out ten bucks. Shut up and THROW!
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome and definitely worth the money. My son luvz them..
customer_reviews.author: LiSa ShUlTz

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: They don't fly like real disc golf discs..they twirl and they just don't work.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Worst set of discs. They only go about 30 yards on average.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Greer

customer_reviews.title: Improved our games!
customer_reviews.text: Great price. Great assortment of discs. My grandkids and I love them and have improved our games because of these great discs.
customer_reviews.author: Marvin Sowers

product_meta.title: Franklin Sports Disc Golf - 3 Disc Pro Set
product_meta.description: Franklin Sports 3 Disc Pro Set features 3 tournament style discs. Each disc has a specific purpose; accuracy, stability and distance. Perfect for a backyard barbecue, day at the park or tailgate party.
feature_bullets: RT Night Owl - 167G putter disc for maximum accuracy
RT Sparrow - 160G mid-range disc engineered for maximum stability
RT Albatross - 160G driver disc engineered for maximum distance

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
